meanings.definition: A person or thing that reverses.
meanings.sent1: The reversers at the train station help guide the vehicles backward.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic used the reversers to fix the malfunctioning conveyor belt.
meanings.sent3: The little robot toy was a cute reverser, always moving in reverse.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a reverser, always finding a way to undo mistakes.
meanings.sent5: The reversers in the clock made time seem to flow backward.
